Get to know team 5 - Hella Hydrated Homies!


Founders of CineSus:


Valeria Martin del Campo


Hey! My name is Valeria, and I am currently a senior at UTEP studying Computer Science. I live with my mom and my brother and my dog, but I will soon be moving to Philadelphia for a job offer. I am pretty nervous but I'm also excited because of the opportunities and experiences this will bring. I work as an IA for the CS Department right now, but I will soon be working for Lockheed Martin. My goal is to move to the Space department and maybe one day work for NASA. I love space and physics and I want to get a MS in physics; my dream would be to make a cool discovery or help humanity in understanding space. If all this fails though, my plan B is to be a frontend web developer or UX/UI designer for any company; I don't really have a preference. Thanks for choosing CineSus!





Giovanna Munoz


Hello everyone, my name is Gio and I am a CS undergrad graduating this Spring 2023. After graduation, I will be working full-time as a Software Engineer in the Dallas, TX area. My passions in CS include: software engineering, data analytics, and product development. I aspire to obtain my Master's in Software Engineering within ten years from now. In my free time, I enjoy listening to metal music, attending metal concerts, and playing Tetris. My favorite bands are: Septicflesh, Metallica, and Whitechapel.






Hiram Morales


Hello! My name is Hiram Morales. I am currently a senior at The University of Texas at El Paso and I'm majoring in Computer Science. Some of my hobbies include playing video games, listening to rock/metal music and attending concerts. Some of my favorite bands are Whitechapel, Metallica, Megadeth, and Trivium. When I graduate, I plan on moving to Dallas Tx and become a full time Software Engineer, or Web developer.






Carlos Cepeda


Hello! My name is Carlos Cepeda. I'm a Computer Science student at The University of Texas at El Paso with a concentration on software engineering. My goal is to become a Software Engineer for Microsoft. I love being outdoors, my hobbies include playing sports, going to the gym, and traveling.






Roman Soto


My name is Roman G. Soto and I was born in El Paso, Texas. I am studying Comp. Sci. and will be graduating in Fall 2023 with my Bachelor's. I am really into going to raves, working out and playing/listening to music. I really enjoy music, as I have learned how to play 20+ instruments over the last 10 or so years since I started my music journey. My goal is to work at Google as a Software Engineer and/or Front End Engineer!

On behalf of the team, we would like to thank you for choosing us!
